---
title: DebugServerApi.debugserver_decode_string method
---

Decodes a hex encoded string.

```csharp
public virtual void debugserver_decode_string(string encodedBuffer, uint encodedLength, 
    out string buffer)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| encoded_buffer | The buffer with a hex encoded string |
| encoded_length | Length of the encoded buffer |
| buffer | Decoded string to be freed by the caller |
